description:
Generate a modern, single-page landing website for a cloud kitchen.

Kitchen Details:
Name: Kailash ka Dhaba
Type: Cloud Kitchen (Delivery-focused)
Cuisine: North Indian / Home-style food
Brand Personality: Warm, homely, hygienic, affordable, trustworthy

Business Information:
Email: kailash@gmail.com
Address: Bopal, Ahmedabad

Target Audience:
Office workers, students, families ordering food online.

Design Style:
- Warm, Indian dhaba-inspired look
- Clean and modern layout
- Food-focused visuals
- Friendly and trustworthy tone

Color & Font Direction:
- Primary color: Deep maroon or dark red (Indian spice tone)
- Secondary color: Saffron / warm orange
- Background: Cream or off-white
- Accent: Fresh green for call-to-action buttons
- Headings font: Poppins (bold, friendly)
- Body font: Inter (clean and readable)

Page Sections (One Page Only):
1. Hero Section
   - Kitchen name prominently displayed
   - Short tagline highlighting home-style taste
   - Call-to-action button (Order Now / Contact Us)

2. About the Kitchen
   - Brief story of Dinesh ka Dhaba
   - Focus on home-style taste, hygiene, and quality ingredients

3. Menu Highlights
   - Popular dishes (Dal Tadka, Paneer Sabzi, Roti, Rice, Thali)
   - Short descriptions for each item

4. Why Choose Us
   - Home-style taste
   - Freshly cooked meals
   - Hygienic kitchen
   - Affordable pricing
   - Fast delivery

5. Contact & Location
   - Email and address clearly displayed
   - Simple contact section

Technical Requirements:
- Generate only one-page website
- Fully responsive (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- Clean semantic HTML
- Modern CSS styling
- No JavaScript required
- Fast-loading and production-ready

Output Requirements:
- Output complete HTML and CSS
- Do not include explanations
- Keep the output concise and structured

pages.name: home
pages.purpose: Single-page landing for a cloud kitchen, showcasing menu, values, and contact information to attract online orders.

styling.theme: warm Indian dhaba-inspired, clean and modern
styling.design_style: clean and modern layout, food-focused visuals, friendly and trustworthy tone
